message: Identified 5 major ADHD-unfriendly patterns in current explanations: (1) Vague abstract language ("involves," "characterized by"), (2) Missing HOW/mechanisms (says WHAT not HOW), (3) Metaphors instead of literal descriptions, (4) Lack of structure/rambling, (5) Overgeneralizations. Found 15+ problematic examples with quoted text. Created comprehensive analysis document with rewriting guidelines.

key_issues: Vague language (involves, characterized by, associated with)
Missing mechanisms (says WHAT but not HOW)
data.user_feedback: no metaphors, no abstract meaning, i find too much metaphors, abstruct meaning hard to absorb
